title: Percentage of Amounts 1
question_text: Every year, the value of a gold cup increases by 10% compared to its price in the previous year. In 2015, the value of the gold cup was £1,000. In 2016, the value of the gold cup was £1,100. What was the value of the gold cup in 2018?
The price of a £20 shirt was decreased by 10% in a sale. After a week, the sale price was increased by 10%. What was the final price of the shirt?
The sale price of a coat is £400. This represents a 20% discount from the original price. What was the original price of the coat?
In Gotham City, 65% of the population voted in the election. 20% of the voters voted for Batman. If the population of Gotham City is 250,000, how many people voted for Batman?

Every year, the value of a silver spoon increases by 20% compared to its price in the previous year. In 2016, the value of the silver spoon was £1,000. In 2017, the value of the silver spoon was £1,200. What was the value of the silver spoon in 2019?
The price of a £30 hat was decreased by 20% in a sale. After a week, the sale price was increased by 20%. What was the final price of the hat?
The sale price of a computer is £800. This represents a 20% discount from the original price. What was the original price of the computer?
In Metropolis, 55% of the population voted in the election. 30% of the voters voted for Lex Luthur. If the population of Metropolis is 500,000, how many people voted for lex Luthur?

Every year, the value of a diamond ring increases by 30% compared to its price in the previous year. In 2015, the value of the diamond ring was £2,000. In 2016, the value of the gold cup was £2,600. What was the value of the diamond ring in 2018?
